15 int num_callbacks = 0;
16 class ProximityListener {
17  private:
18  int num_sensors{0};
19  int num_control_points{0};
20  float distance_threshold{0.0};
21  float floor_threshold{0.04};
22  bool removeFloor{true};
23  std::vector<float> sphere_radiuses{0.23, 0.24, 0.2, 0.237, 0.225, 0.20, 0.27, 0.3};
24  std::unique_ptr<Eigen::Vector3d[]> live_points;
25 
26  void sensorCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr& scan);
27  std::unique_ptr<ros::Subscriber[]> sub;
28  std::unique_ptr<Eigen::Vector3d[]> translation1;
29  std::unique_ptr<Eigen::Vector3d[]> translation2;
30  std::unique_ptr<Eigen::Vector3d[]> translation_control_points;
31  std::unique_ptr<Eigen::Quaterniond[]> rotation;
32  std::unique_ptr<tf::StampedTransform[]> transform;
33  std::unique_ptr<tf::StampedTransform[]> transform_control_points;
34  tf::TransformListener listener;
35  bool isInSphere(Eigen::Vector3d);
36 
37  public:
38  ros::NodeHandle n;
39  ProximityListener(int argc, char **argv, int num_sensors, int num_control_points, float distance_threshold, bool removeFloor, float floor_threshold);
40  ~ProximityListener();

43 
44 ProximityListener::ProximityListener(int argc, char **argv, int num_sensors, int num_control_points,
45  float distance_threshold = 0.0, bool removeFloor = true, float floor_threshold = 0.04) {
46  distance_threshold = distance_threshold;
47  removeFloor = removeFloor;
48  floor_threshold = floor_threshold;
49  this->live_points = std::make_unique<Eigen::Vector3d[]>(num_sensors);
50  this->num_control_points = num_control_points;
51  this->num_sensors = num_sensors;
52  this->sub = std::make_unique<ros::Subscriber[]>(num_sensors);
53  this->translation1 = std::make_unique<Eigen::Vector3d[]>(num_sensors);
54  this->translation2 = std::make_unique<Eigen::Vector3d[]>(num_sensors);
55  this->rotation = std::make_unique<Eigen::Quaterniond[]>(num_sensors);
56  this->transform = std::make_unique<tf::StampedTransform[]>(num_sensors);
57  this->transform_control_points = std::make_unique<tf::StampedTransform[]>(num_control_points);
58  this->translation_control_points = std::make_unique<Eigen::Vector3d[]>(num_control_points);
59  for (int i = 0; i < num_sensors; i++) {
60  sub[i] = n.subscribe<sensor_msgs::LaserScan>("proximity_data" + std::to_string(i), 1, &ProximityListener::sensorCallback, this);
61  }
62  n.setParam("num_sensors", num_sensors);
63 }
64 
65 ProximityListener::~ProximityListener() {
66 }
67 
68 void ProximityListener::sensorCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr& scan) {
69  int sensor_number = std::stoi(scan->header.frame_id.substr(scan->header.frame_id.find_first_of("0123456789"), scan->header.frame_id.length() -1));
70 
71  try {
72  listener.lookupTransform("/world", "/proximity_link" + std::to_string(sensor_number),
73  ros::Time(0), transform[sensor_number]);
74  translation1[sensor_number] << transform[sensor_number].getOrigin().getX(),
75  transform[sensor_number].getOrigin().getY(),
76  transform[sensor_number].getOrigin().getZ();
77  translation2[sensor_number] << scan->ranges[0],
78  0.0,
79  0.0;
80  rotation[sensor_number].w() = transform[sensor_number].getRotation().getW();
81  rotation[sensor_number].x() = transform[sensor_number].getRotation().getX();
82  rotation[sensor_number].y() = transform[sensor_number].getRotation().getY();
83  rotation[sensor_number].z() = transform[sensor_number].getRotation().getZ();
84 
85  live_points[sensor_number] = translation1[sensor_number] + (rotation[sensor_number] * translation2[sensor_number]);
86  } catch (tf::TransformException ex) {
87  ROS_ERROR("%s", ex.what());
88  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
89  }
90 }
91 
92 void ProximityListener::start() {
93  ros::Publisher pub = n.advertise<ros_robotic_skin::PointArray>("live_points", 1);
94  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(0);
95  spinner.start();
96  ROS_INFO("Loading Proximity Listener...");
97  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
98  ROS_INFO("Loaded");
99 
100  geometry_msgs::Point point;
101  ros_robotic_skin::PointArray msg;
102 
103  ros::Rate rate(50.0);
104  while (ros::ok()) {
105  for (int i = 0; i < num_sensors; i++) {
106  if (std::isnan(live_points[i].x()) || isInSphere(live_points[i]) || ( (live_points[i].z() < floor_threshold) && removeFloor) );
107  else
108  {
109  point.x = live_points[i].x();
110  point.y = live_points[i].y();
111  point.z = live_points[i].z();
112  msg.points.push_back(point);
113  // std::cout << live_points[i].z() << std::endl ;
114  }
115  }
116  pub.publish<ros_robotic_skin::PointArray>(msg);
117  msg.points.clear();
118  rate.sleep();
119  }
120 }
121 
122 bool ProximityListener::isInSphere(Eigen::Vector3d point_in_space) {
123  for (int i = 0; i < num_control_points; i++) {
124  listener.lookupTransform("/world", "/control_point" + std::to_string(i),
125  ros::Time(0), transform_control_points[i]);
126  translation_control_points[i] << transform_control_points[i].getOrigin().getX(),
127  transform_control_points[i].getOrigin().getY(),
128  transform_control_points[i].getOrigin().getZ();
129  if ((point_in_space - translation_control_points[i]).norm() < sphere_radiuses[i])
130  return true;
131  }
132  return false;
133 }
134 
135 int topic_count(std::string topic_substring) {
136  ros::master::V_TopicInfo topic_infos;
137  ros::master::getTopics(topic_infos);
138 
139  int count = 0;
140  for (ros::master::V_TopicInfo::iterator it = topic_infos.begin() ; it != topic_infos.end(); it++) {
141  const ros::master::TopicInfo& info = *it;
142  if (info.name.find(topic_substring) != std::string::npos) {
143  count++;
144  }
145  }
146  return count;
147 }
148 
149 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
150  ros::init(argc, argv, "proximity_listener");
151  ProximityListener proximity_listener(argc, argv, topic_count("proximity_data"), 8);
152  proximity_listener.start();
153 
154  return 0;
155 }
